name: 色紙
description: A thick card dedicated to Yuuya.

name: 黒板のメッセージ
description: Mysterious writing on the blackboard.

name: 患者のカルテ
description: Patients' psychiatric clinical records.

name: 胸元から出血
description: Miho lost a lot of blood from her chest.

name: キッチンの包丁
description: There are *kitchen knives* in the kitchen.

name: 武器庫のサバイバルナイフ
description: There are *survival knives* in the armory.

name: 武器庫の警備
description: *Takeo* and *Takuya* were guarding the armory yesterday.

name: 警備中のタケオさん
description: Takeo had to go to the *bathroom* for a while.

name: 腕に不自然な腫れ
description: Miho's arm is *unnaturally swollen.*

name: 雑巾
description: A slightly damp cloth.

name: 左腕に注射痕
description: Miho's left arm has a probable *syringe injection wound.*

name: 使用された睡眠薬
description: Sleeping pills. *Some are already used.*

name: 警備中の証言
description: *Osamu* watched Takuya keeping watch alone.

name: 病室の注射器
description: There are syringes in the clinic. *Somebody took* one.

name: 脚立
description: A stepladder. Useful to reach high places with.

name: お面
description: A wolf mask. The same one that wolf used yesterday.

name: タクヤさんと彼女の記念日
description: Takuya and his girlfriend's anniversary is December 24.

name: タクヤのスマホ
description:
Takuya's smartphone.
Bloody fingers stained the screen.

name: 狼の写真
description: A picture Takuya took of the wolf. The *weapon is blurry and hard to see.*

name: 水槽の電灯
description: A fishtank's lightbulb. I took this from the fishtank in the classroom.

name: 鶏肉
description: Poultry. We took this from the kitchen.

name: 水槽の岩
description: A rock that was in the fishtank. There's a red stain on the rock.

name: 割れた水槽のライト
description: The light in the *fishtank* in the plant room is broken.

name: 植物室にある鉢
description: A *pot* in the plant room that could double as a *blunt weapon.*

name: タクヤさんは撲殺された
description: Takuya appears *beaten to death.* His face is in a hideous state...

name: タケオさんとマキさん
description: *Takeo* seems to be *taking interest* in *Maki.*

name: カーテンの切れ端
description: A curtain scrap. Tattered and old, but the cloth itself is sturdy enough.

name: 即席ナイフ
description: A knife made from a glass fragment and a curtain scrap. I cut my palm making it.

name: 睡眠薬
description: Sleeping pills. I took these from the clinic.

name: 睡眠薬入りの紅茶
description: Black tea with sleeping pills mixed in.

name: 灯油入りペットボトル
description: A plastic bottle with kerosene inside.

name: ペットボトル
description: An empty plastic bottle.

name: 使い捨てカイロ
description: A disposable hand warmer. It's unopened, and seems new.

name: 線香
description: I took a few sticks of *incense* from the desk in the classroom.

name: チエさんのロウソク
description: Chie is carrying around *many candles* for use in her rituals.

name: ボイスレコーダー
description: A high-performance voice recorder. Borrowed from Maki to fake Osamu's screams with.

name: ボイスレコーダーの破片
description: A fragment of the voice recorder. *I couldn't find the main part of it.*

name: 水入りのバケツ
description: I put water in an empty bucket.

name: オサムさんの日記帳
description: Osamu's diary. Entries are written every 30 minutes: final entry is at 11:30 PM. Nothing from midnight onwards.

name: オサムさんの懐中時計
description: Osamu's broken watch. It was burned in the conflagration, and it no longer works.

name: ミステリー小説
description: A mystery novel. Within is written details about a "burned corpse time difference trick."

name: 「蝶の糸」という本
description: A book entitled, "The Butterflies' Thread." *7 butterflies* are on the cover.

name: 「星のほとり」という本
description: A book entitled, "The Banks of the Stars." *5 stars* are on the cover.

name: 「青い鳥」という本
description: A book entitled, "The Blue Birds." *4 birds* are on the cover.

name: リビングにある大きな時計
description: A giant clock in the living room. The only way to keep track of time in this building.

name: オサムさんと図書室
description: Osamu often came to the library to read. 本を読んでいるときは隙が多いと言っていた。

name: 絵日記
description: A child's picture diary. The pages inside are torn up in spots. A page remains with a boy holding up his thumb.

name: 破れた女の子のページ
description: A drawing of a girl making a peace sign. Probably a page torn from the picture diary.

name: 破れたお父さんのページ
description: A drawing of a man, appearing to be a father, is holding up both thumbs. Probably a page torn from the picture diary.

name: 破れたお母さんのページ
description: A drawing of a woman, appearing to be a mother, raising a hand. Probably a page torn from the picture diary.

name: タケオさんの通知書
description: Due to Takeo's negligence of his duties, he allowed an atrocious criminal to roam free.

name: 血まみれのボロボロの服
description: Bloody, tattered *clothing* belonging to a *woman.* There are numerous holes in it, as though from stabbing.

name: バール
description: A crowbar that was in the armory.

name: 扉の外側の傷
description: There are scratch marks on the bottom *exterior edge of the door.*

name: ボロボロになった爪
description: Looking at Chie's corpse, I can see that her *nails are scuffed up and broken.*

name: 花の絵の描かれた紙
description: A piece of paper with a *rose bud* drawn on it. It was left beside Chie's box.

name: ３つの絵の描かれた紙
description: A piece of paper with a "nutcracker," "scorpion," and "fish" drawn on it, inside Chie's box.

name: 懐中電灯
description: A flashlight. It seems to have a working bulb.

name: 小さな鍵
description: A small key. It was inside of a rose.

name: 星座表
description: A compendium of the 12 star signs. The marks of the 12 star signs are drawn on it.

name: 2つ目の鍵
description: A tiny key. It was inside the clock's nutcracker's mouth in the living room.

name: チエさんのポエム
description: Chie's poem. It's handwritten, but the *handwriting* seems *different* from her will's.

name: 床にこぼれた液体
description: Underneath the poison shelf in the armory, there are several drops of *some kind of fluid* spilled on the floor.

name: ドライバー
description: A screwdriver that should be able to loosen screws.

name: 物置と武器庫が繋がる通気口
description: A small ventilation shaft connects the storage room and the armory. Duct tape scraps are on the armory side entrance.

name: 扉の内側のキズ
description: On the *interior of the door,* there are *marks* as though from *nail scratches.*

name: 他の棚の違和感
description: There are two shelves in the storage room. The large shelf on the right seems tidier than before.

name: 紙とペン
description: I found these in *Kou's belongings.* I think they're what were used to write Chie's will with.

name: 膝の上の遺書
description: There's a will in Chie's *lap.*

name: 思い出の家族写真
description: An *old portrait* of a happy *family.* Their faces are time-faded, so I can't see who they are.

name: ドアの鍵
description: I found a door key on the lightbulb.
